LanguageData.RK_MagicWand.label: ratkin magic wand
LanguageData.RK_MagicWand.description: A highly valuable magic wand created by Ratkins. It can be used to open locked doors or to clean up rooms. It can also be thrown, but why would someone do that?
LanguageData.RK_MagicWand.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.RK_MagicWand.tools.1.label: edge
